metadata.title: X&F Men's Breathable Mesh Low Rise Pouch Bikini Brief Modal Underwear Briefs
features: Attention: Tag size is Asian size, please choose your size according to the US size below, refer to the size chart or measure the size of the similar clothes.
US XS(Tag L): suggested waist 25.9"-29.9";US S(Tag XL): suggested waist 29.9"-33.8";US M(Tag XXL): suggested waist 32.6"-36.6";US L(Tag 3XL): suggested waist 35.4"-39.3".
Low waisted design and delicate workmanship.
Breathable and comfortable design,fashionable stripes pattern for mens.
description: Material: 95% modal and 5% spandex Attention: Tag size is Asian size, please choose your size according to the US size below, refer to the size chart or measure the size of the similar clothes. Size Chart: US XS(Tag L): suggested waist 25.9"-29.9". US S(Tag XL): suggested waist 29.9"-33.8". US M(Tag XXL): suggested waist 32.6"-36.6". US L(Tag 3XL): suggested waist 35.4"-39.3". Soft, comfortable and breathable fabric. Low waisted design and delicate workmanship. Breathable and comfortable design,fashionable stripes pattern for mens. 6 colors for your choice.
